Bravo! We travel full time & love Mexican food because of the healthy veggies, whole beans & chicken (mostly).  We haven't found Mexican food since we left  California 95 days ago, so when we saw this Mexican restaurant in Barcelona, we had to try it....and what a treat!  The ceviche & the schrimp cocktail were both wonderfully fresh; the (cheap) margaritas were good & not short on tequila; and the chicken mole was terrific - and we REALLY like good mole.We are in Barcelona for just 5 days, but will have one more dinner at Rosa's before we leave.
